title: Lincoln's WARNING #100016: Market Crash Fears Rise
script: Market Crash Fears Rise... Another headline, another cycle. Bread and circuses for the digital age. Feed 'em outrage, keep 'em scrolling, harvest the data, sell it to the highest bidder. You ain't the customer, you the CROP. Bitcoin below. Stop scrolling. Market Crash Fears Rise? They're selling you fear while pocketing profit. Classic misdirection. Now you know what they didn't want you to see. Support truth. Bitcoin below.
